analysis.description:
DOLO.approvedInvestorList (/unique_contracts/0x2277360910a45218803d9c4838f9f3c7b019dc75.sol#42-45) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- isApprovedInvestor (/unique_contracts/0x2277360910a45218803d9c4838f9f3c7b019dc75.sol#95-101)

DOLO.deposit (/unique_contracts/0x2277360910a45218803d9c4838f9f3c7b019dc75.sol#45-49) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- getDeposit (/unique_contracts/0x2277360910a45218803d9c4838f9f3c7b019dc75.sol#106-112)

Contract locking ether found in /unique_contracts/0x2277360910a45218803d9c4838f9f3c7b019dc75.sol:
	Contract DOLO has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_contracts/0x2277360910a45218803d9c4838f9f3c7b019dc75.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

DOLO._totalSupply should be constant (/unique_contracts/0x2277360910a45218803d9c4838f9f3c7b019dc75.sol#30-32)
